name: RetrieveFigmaComments
description:
Retrieve comments from a Figma file.

Use this tool to get all comments left on a specified Figma file. It helps in tracking feedback and discussions related to the file.

parameters.name: file_identifier
parameters.description: The key or branch key of the Figma file to retrieve comments from. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

value_schema.description: File to get comments from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

parameters.name: return_comments_as_markdown
parameters.description: Return comments in markdown format if set to true; otherwise, return in plain text.

value_schema.description: If enabled, will return comments as their markdown equivalents when applicable.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: as_md
parameters.description: If enabled, will return comments as their markdown equivalents when applicable.

value_schema.description: If enabled, will return comments as their markdown equivalents when applicable.

parameters.name: file_key
parameters.description: File to get comments from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

value_schema.description: File to get comments from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.
